E-Just Hotel Guest House

 {/* Select Labels */}

Deluxe Double Room

Meals can be prepared in the kitchenette, which has an oven, a microwave, a tea and coffee maker, and a toaster. The spacious double room features air conditioning, a mini-bar, a terrace with a quiet street view, and a private bathroom boasting a bath.

Facilities

  • Safe box
  • Cleaning services
  • Air conditioning
  • Ensuite bathroom
  • Soundproofing
 ); } export default BookNow;
